name: broken exodii worker
description: A broken exodii worker.  It's possible it could be gutted for parts.

name: broken exodii quadruped
description: A broken exodii walker.  Still looks intimidating despite being permanently inoperative, possibly due to the sheer size and mass.  Could be gutted for parts.

name: broken exodii mini-tank
description: A broken tank cyborg.  Still looks intimidating despite being permanently inoperative, possibly due to the sheer size and mass.  Could be gutted for parts.

name: broken exodii turret
description: A broken exodii turret.  Still looks intimidating despite being permanently inoperative, possibly due to the sheer size and mass.  Could be gutted for parts.

name: broken exodii balloon-drone
description: A broken balloon drone.  The balloon has been shredded, but most of the chassis is still intact.  Could be gutted for parts.
